name: part_002
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Shining Memory ⧸ ラストに重大告知‼【#星街すいせい5周年LIVE 】 [GbIIr3waYzI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song "Seiza ni naretara" (If I Could Be a Constellation).

subtitles.original:
放送室
作詞・作曲：MI8k
subtitles.english:
Housoushitsu (Broadcast Room)
Lyrics & Composition: MI8k

subtitles.original: 考えてたことが言葉に出ない
subtitles.english: The things I was thinking about won't come out in words

subtitles.original: 先走った後悔と汗が手に残る
subtitles.english: Remaining in my hands are hasty regrets and sweat

subtitles.original: ただ真っ直ぐに見ていたいだけなのに
subtitles.english: Even though I just want to look straight ahead

subtitles.original: 今日も見切りをつけた　部屋真っ暗にしてしまった
subtitles.english: Today too, I've given up and made my room pitch black

subtitles.original: ああ　部屋を消滅させている
subtitles.english: Ah, I'm making the room vanish

subtitles.original: この部屋宇宙の端線だ
subtitles.english: This room is the borderline of the universe

subtitles.original: 私から出た SOS だけ届いてないよな
subtitles.english: Only the SOS I sent out isn't reaching, right?

subtitles.original: 涙をずっとしまってる　どんな結末があるかを見たくて
subtitles.english:
I've been holding back my tears,
wanting to see what kind of ending there will be

subtitles.original: 完成するまで悲しみを拒んでいる
subtitles.english: Rejecting sadness until it's complete

subtitles.original: 不安を感じていたのが体のどこか知らないけど
subtitles.english: I don't know where in my body I was feeling anxiety, but...

subtitles.original: こんな場所でまで響き続けていく
subtitles.english: It continues to resonate even in a place like this

subtitles.original: 理由を見つけたんだ
subtitles.english: I've found the reason

subtitles.original: 変えられない呼吸も鼓動も
subtitles.english: Neither the unchangeable breathing nor the heartbeat

subtitles.original: 不安定な形も完璧に見えるとき
subtitles.english: Even the unstable shape looks perfect at times

subtitles.original: 今更後ろ見ない　振り向くのは怖い
subtitles.english: I won't look back now, it's scary to turn around

subtitles.original: この場所だけは私のこと知ってるんだ
subtitles.english: Only this place knows about me

subtitles.original: 手を引いて向かう場所示すのだ
subtitles.english: Taking my hand and showing me where to go

subtitles.original: そう思えば強く輝けるから
subtitles.english: Because thinking so makes me shine brighter

subtitles.original: 届いてほしいのは SOS じゃなくて優しい言葉
subtitles.english:
What I want to reach you is not an SOS,
but kind words

subtitles.original: 涙をずっとしまっても　笑顔のままでいる姿で
subtitles.english: Even if I hold back my tears, with a smile on my face

subtitles.original: 駆け抜け君のもとまで最短で辿り着くよ
subtitles.english: I'll run through and reach you in the shortest distance

subtitles.original: 孤独を感じていたのが体のどこか知らないけど
subtitles.english: I don't know where in my body I was feeling loneliness, but...

subtitles.original: ほんの少しでも君に近づきたい
subtitles.english: I want to get even just a little closer to you

subtitles.original: 何かが変わればいい
subtitles.english: I hope something changes

subtitles.original: 私から出た優しい言葉だけ
subtitles.english: Only the kind words that came from me

subtitles.original: 君に届いてほしい
subtitles.english: I want them to reach you

subtitles.original: 小さな宇宙に生まれただけ
subtitles.english: Just born into a small universe

subtitles.original: 遠い場所から君を見つけただけ
subtitles.english: Just found you from a distant place

subtitles.original: 涙をずっとしまってる　どんな結末になるかを知りたくて
subtitles.english:
I've been holding back my tears,
wanting to know what kind of ending it will be

subtitles.original: 完成するまでサヨナラは拒んでいる
subtitles.english: Rejecting goodbyes until it's complete

subtitles.original: 不安を感じていたのが体のどこか知らないまま
subtitles.english: While still not knowing where in my body I was feeling anxiety

subtitles.original: こんな場所でまで響き続けていく
subtitles.english: It continues to resonate even in a place like this

subtitles.original: 理由を見つけたんだ
subtitles.english: I've found the reason

subtitles.original: 皆さん、たくさん盛り上がっていきましょう！
subtitles.english: Everyone, let's keep the excitement going!

subtitles.original:
星座になれたら
作詞：樋口愛 作曲：内藤英徳
subtitles.english:
Seiza ni naretara (If I Could Be a Constellation)
Lyrics: Ai Higuchi Composition: Hidenori Naito

subtitles.original: もうすぐ時計は九時
subtitles.english: It'll soon be nine o'clock

subtitles.original: もうそこに一番星
subtitles.english: And the first star is already there

subtitles.original: 影を踏んで　夜に紛れたくなった帰り道
subtitles.english:
I wanted to step on shadows and disappear into the night
on my way home

subtitles.original: どんなに探してみても
subtitles.english: No matter how much I search

subtitles.original: 一つしかない星
subtitles.english: There's only one star

subtitles.original: 何億光年　離れたところからあんなに輝く
subtitles.english: Shining so brightly from billions of light-years away
